name: Rage Cube REMAKE
description:
A desktop remake with less bug... maybe

A rage game with some cube, and all the original triple A sounds

In this version you can see the solution if you are not a pro player (press h in game session)

Controls:

  • WASD : move
  • left click : teleport
  • m : mute
  • h : help
  • esc :quit

Enjoy this little game.
